entry.title: Done
entry.content:
I canâ€™t believe my dts is over. I really donâ€™t. It seems two days ago I arrived and now iâ€™m barbados on my shabby sofa, little bugs all over me, somewhere the green leg of an unlucky GRASSHOPPER i killed two months ago. Itâ€™s as iâ€™ve just left. And still itâ€™s not the same.
my lovely fellow students are gone. and i'm heartbroken, seriously. it's just horribly sad.
The people with whom iâ€™ve gone through all of this, through laughter and tears and frustration and joy and prayer and singing, traveling and waiting, everything. . I'm struggling to sleep in a room by myself and I constantly find stuff they left and I can't handle it at all.

So, I LOVED thailand. Itâ€™s one of the most amazing countries iâ€™ve ever been an the people are just lovely and... i really canâ€™t explain what this time and this country means to me. Iâ€™ve seen so much and done so little and still iâ€™m happy about the opportunity that made me able to do SOMETHING. I canâ€™t stop thank god for his provision and how much he carried me through it and how much he protected my heart. How much love he gave me for all the kids and adults i worked with, a love i could have never formed or kept myself.  God was the most amazing thing in this whole outreach. Iâ€™m so happy i have him. Heâ€™s awesome.

So, soon iâ€™ll be home and iâ€™m just as afraid as thrilled about it. I canâ€™t wait to hug and kiss and cuddle the best family of all, the best friends of all and be with them all and see the snow and smell the winterair and just celebrate christmas. I canâ€™t wait to see the mountains and just all of my beautiful, amazing homecountry. I canâ€™t wait to go to my church, my amazing church i missed so much.

I canâ€™t wait to go home and it feels like I canâ€™t stand leaving. Iâ€™ve never been so torn before.

I love you guys
See.
You.
SOON!
Aline

entry.title: Endless Journeys
entry.content:
Okay. I got three days of travelling on my back right now, the second time. And i got some tips for you guys. Just in case you ever go through that crazyness and want to be prepared. So.

If you travel with Air China, prepare with the following mindset: Personal space is NOT one of your rights. Be open for a good cuddle with the person in line behind you!

Be open minded. Chinese people seem to have flippinâ€™ family reunions in planes and will NOT stop talking. So. take earplugs with you. Good earplugs. Seriously.

Enjoy the food! Itâ€™s gross and makes you sick but whatever, it keeps you busy.

If the stewardesse asks for a drink, say loud and clear â€žWATERâ€œ, not â€žjust waterâ€œ, â€ža water pleaseâ€œ or  â€žcould i get a waterâ€œ. You might get apple juice.

If your plane finally lands and you can leave, embrace yourself. Theyâ€™re gonna run you over if you donâ€™t stand there like a big guy with enough strenghth to keep back their earnest tries to knock you over and run to the exit.

Donâ€™t watch the movies. Really. Theyâ€™ll show alien movies and you might be witness of a half naked woman giving birth to an alien and this doesnâ€™t really go along with your meal.

So when you land, be quick. Youâ€™ll stand in line with a bunch of people not knowing what personal space is (as mentionned above) and when theyâ€™re done cuddling you theyâ€™ll just overtake when they get the opportunity.

At the airport. Believe me, just give a sh*t on what people think and walk around however you want. Like me. In socks with vegetable sticks. Feel the way people look at you, put your head up and embrace being weird. Itâ€™s awesome. Because the only thing i can say about being civilised and goodlooking on journeys: Ainâ€™t nobody got time for that!

Last thing. Just in case your sleeping rythmâ€™s out of control and you get a little crazy. DONâ€™T talk about airplane bombs at the gate. Really. You scare people and you scare yourself too. Belive me. I know it.

So, enough. Iâ€™m at the plane right now and have to look at western people.

entry.title: uglyness and underpants
entry.content:
well well. ziit chruuuecht verbii. sind di letscht wuche na i zwei slums gange mit de chind go schpiele, am samschtig bimne rugbyprogramm fuer chind usde slums mitgholfe.

drum, zur unterhaltig und erfreuig paar sache womer sich mues bewusst sii wennmer uf thailand gaat.

Thais sind direkt. heisst, wennmer paar villi kilos zvill druff het wirdmer nachdem mer vorgschtellt worde isch gfragt "why you so fat". noed mir passiert, suscht wueri ez situps und liegeschtuetze mache, aber trotzdem. denn. bleich zsii in thailand isch schoenheit i ihrere beschte form. heisst, mer mues eigentli noed es allzu huebsches gsicht ha solang mer reini, wiissi huut het. ungluecklicherwiis binich mit sehr sehr dunkler huut beschenkt, was denn zu folgender konversation mit eusere uebersetzerin gfuehrt het:

(iifuehrig: mer hend vergliche obmer de gliich mannegschmack hend.)

me: you think this guy's handsome? (ueberuus attraktive maa ufme werbeplakat)
her: not really.
me: But why?! look at this body! look at this face!
her: he's too tanned! so brown! almost as brown as you!
me: well.That's a problem i guess.

heisst, ich bin offiziell unattraktiv. deal with it!

abgseh vo dem isch eusi uebersetzerin ziemlich amuesant, wenn sie saetz gheie laat wie folgende, zumne bellende hund:
"if you bite me i'll eat you!"

whatelse whatelse. ah ja. in thailand chamer grundsaetzlich ade maert chleider chaufe fuer 3 franke fuer es shirt wo dihei wuerd 15 choschte, was ziemlich toll isch, aber au giiezig macht was zur folg het dasmer denn imne eher tuuere shoppingcenter ide aktione umewuehlt. wo dummerwiis underwoesch fuer asiatischi manne isch. was irgendwie komisch isch, will, ich fuehl mich trotz unnattraktivitaet noed wie en thailaendische maa, aber was willmer mache.

endi nechscht wuche fahremer mitem bus quer durs land uf chiang rai. freu mich:)

miss you!

love
aline

entry.title: lasting memories
entry.content:
mer sind s erscht mal so richtig anen iisatz gange:) es isch eifach nur de wahnsinn gsii. mer sind inen slum gange (womer d wuche vorher ufgruumt hend) und sind chli duregloffe woruff us allne egge chind cho sind wills gwuesst hend dasmer mitne spiele wennd. und so arm die chind au sind, sie sind mer so vill riicher vorcho als chind woni diheim gseh, glangwiilt am handy sitzed und ihre facebookstatus aktualisiered und bilder vo bruelende emofraue ufeladed mit depressive spruech denebed. nei, noed all chind sind so dihei, gnausowenig wie all chind i slums eifach nur zfriede und gluecklich sind, aber de kontrascht hauts der gliich umd ohre.
mer sind also imne chliine gmeinschaftsruum vo dem slum. 12 chind, oeppe 4i bis 10i, sind vor eus det inegwuslet und hend, achtung, d'bletter und gueselzuegs wo umeglege isch ufgrumet demit mer uf suberem bode choend sitze. ja, ich ha s'erscht mal fascht traene ide auge gha, ich gestehe.? die chind sind soooo klar gottes chind, mer isch nanie so klar gsi wieso gott seit das sis riich fuer chind gschaffe isch. so voller liebi und fuehrsorg. sie hend es uh chlises meitli mit debii gha und all hendsie behandlet als wersi s choschtbarschte wos hend. sie hetne ade haar gschrenzt und ich ha ide gsichtli gseh dases wuerkli weh gmacht het. und die einzig antwort druff isch gsii dases sich befreit hend zum sie nacher nameh knudle.. en chliine bueb het sini babyschwoeschter umetreit als wersie es schtuck reins gold und hetsie noed usde hand geh.. mer hend zersch so oeppis wie "lueged noed ume de fuchs gaat ume.." gschpillt und wos denn afange hend voellig duredreie vo all dem ufregende hemmer gseit sie doerfed oeppis male... ich ha eigentlich denkt dasmer paar chind muend speziell unterhalte wills noed choend stillsitze und zeichne. aber nei. chum hend stift und papier gseh hends afange umetanze und lache wills sich so gfreut hend. es chliises meitli isch immer noech zu mir anegsesse und het schiinbar zuefellig aglehnt oder so. d'chind sind all eher zrugghaltend aber sie choemed immer go zeige wases gmacht hend demit mer denn i eusem brochne thai seged es seg wunderschoen demits denn choend eus aschtrahle und bizli uslache abem wort womer so komisch seged. wos denn ziit gsi isch zum heigah isch s'chline meitli wo immer nebed mir blibe isch weggloffe, churz schtah blibe, dreit sich um und schickt mer es luftkuessli. es toent nach nuet. aber das isch die herzigscht geschte womer je oepper zeigt het.
es isch noed nur eifach und laessig und trallala, will mer noed cha ignoriere das die chind in armuet lebed, paar vonene kei geburtszertifikat hend und drum noed id schuel choend oder jemals s land verlah choend oder staatlichi unterschtuetzig werded ha. oder dasmer keis wort verschtaht. aber ich wuerd die erfahrig nei bereue. und ich cha nur jedem empfehle sich demit z beschaeftige und sich vilicht en ruck z geh und en missionstrip zmache. mer denkt vilicht mer vertraegt all das elend noed, aber s'elend isch da, egal ob mers ez gseht oder noed. und wenns ja eh da isch, werum noed versueche s'es bitzli besser z'mache..?

love
aline

entry.title: thai massage or being systematically hurt by little asian women
entry.content:
a memorial.

me lying there. smells nice. like in a massage saloon. like it.
thai woman starts massaging my feet.
well. hurts a bit.
uuuuuh wait. that hurts.
nocknocknock. 
doooon't do that. oh please. iuuh.
pacpacpac
did she just BEAT my feet?
her phone rings.
is she seriously gonna pick that up? no way.
she picks it up.
what the.. well. not that bad. so she can only hurt me with one hand. jackpot.
aaaah, she's going up to my legs. gonna be better.
what is she doing. oooohmyword. that tickles. go awaaay there.
outchoutchoutchoutch. oooutch.
KNOCK.
oh sh*t. is it broken? I CAN'T FEEL ANYTHING!
flapflapflap
aah i can. hurts as well.
she changes legs. go for it. destroyed the first one, get to the next.

10 minutes later...

yes, go for my arms. but leave my legs alone. poor guys. must be black and blue.
well, that's nice now. uuuh i like that.
crackcrackcrack
nooo. why. whywhywhy.
"wuah phan du gah?"
perfect. what if she asks me if it's too soft? I'M GONNA DIE!
ah. i have to turn around. silly me.
oh no. she got my back now.
wait. what is this. where is your hand, lady. i know, in massages they may touch your butt.
but this is not touching, this is grabbing and pushing it like it's a tennis ball.
seriously dude. this is awkward.
let's take a look at justine beside me.
OH MY! she's standing on her leg! oh pain oh pain! this is gonna be me in two minutes
I'M GONNA DIE!
okay, breath. concentrate on the pain in your back.
nocnocnoc
wuuuusa. this is NOT healthy. don't make me paralized. please.
what is she doing with my arm. ohohoh. don't do this. this looks weird. why is my arm in this positi...
KNOCK.
dead. i'm gonna be one armed.
okay. she's at my neck now.
uuuuh. man. don't break it. it kills people.
well, this feels good now.
aaaw not anymore.
ooouch.
oh no. she's behind me. she's gonna stand on my leg like..
KNOCK.
oh dear lord.

well, it turned out fine. i paid 150 baht which is 5 dollars for one hour of torture.
next time someone's gonna have to pay me 200 dollars if they wanna torture me.

ich bi achoo. ich glaubs gad selber noed dasich tatsaechlich ha choene z frankfurt de flueger waechsle, oh wunder! okay, es isch eifacher als brot bache, aber gliich.

s fluege isch a sich sehr amuesant gsi, het eifach es paar anderi passagier gern gfragt wieso sie eigentlich ganz in wiiss flueged, oder voll gschminkt mit schraegem cap ufem chopf (wieso und vorallem WIE hebt das??).
